page.title: 14Games
page.content: When I'm at home I go down the rec. to meet my friends or, if its raining I play with my Sindy dolls or my Pretty Pony. Sometimes we pretend we're people on televsion. Sometimes we play space games. We pretend that the aliens come and we have to fight. At school the boys like playing football best on the playground but sometimes the little ones get hit by the ball and they have to stop. We play skipp- ing. Here is my favourite skipping game:{Cinderella { Dressed in yellow {Went upstairs to find a feller {Do you love him? Yes/No { Will you live in a pigsty or a {palace? { } {Will you wear silk or rags?} Then you skip till you trip up saying Yes/No. Andrea, aged 8.
